languages.text: "Пока неизвестно. Дворянские семейства валят ответственность друг на друга. Агентура почтенного Ахиллеаса Скаландра, размещенная в Сципионе 84-249, героически погибла, спасая население от катастрофы. В их последних отчетах упоминается некая уязвимость индустриальных секторов нижнего улья, но без подробностей, и сейчас все ваши слуги заняты не расследованием причин кризиса, а борьбой с его последствиями".

"It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences."
languages.original_text: "Пока неизвестно. Дворянские семейства валят ответственность друг на друга. Агентура почтенного Ахиллеаса Скаландра, размещенная в Сципионе 84-249, героически погибла, спасая население от катастрофы. В их последних отчетах упоминается некая уязвимость индустриальных секторов нижнего улья, но без подробностей, и сейчас все ваши слуги заняты не расследованием причин кризиса, а борьбой с его последствиями".

traits.locale_text: "It is still unclear. Noble houses are laying the responsibility on each other. The agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while saving the population from disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerability of the industrial sectors of the lower hive, but do not go into further detail, and all of your servants are now busy not with the investigation of the causes of the crisis, but with dealing with its consequences".

"It is still unclear. Noble houses are laying the responsibility on each other. Their latest reports mention some vulnerability of the industrial sectors of the lower hive, but do not go into further detail, and all of your servants are now busy not with the investigation of the causes of the crisis, but with dealing with its consequences".

Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their final reports mentioned some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but did not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences."

languages.text: “目前我们还不清楚原因，那些贵族互相推卸责任。尊贵的阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德驻扎在希皮奥内84-249特工试图在灾难期间拯救幸存者，最终全部英勇牺牲。他们最后的报告提及了巢都底部工业区的部分缺陷，但并没有进行详细说明。此外，您所有的仆人目前都在忙着调查这场危机的成因，但却没有采取任何措施应对已经酿成的后果。”
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but do not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences."

traits.locale_text: “目前我们还不清楚原因，那些贵族互相推卸责任。尊贵的阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德驻扎在希皮奥内84-249特工试图在灾难期间拯救幸存者，最终全部英勇牺牲。他们最后的报告提及了巢都底部工业区的部分缺陷，但并没有进行详细说明。此外，您所有的仆人目前都在忙着调查这场危机的成因，但却没有采取任何措施应对已经酿成的后果。”

languages.text: «Todavía no está claro. Las casas nobles se echan la culpa unas a otras. Agentes del venerable Achilleas Scalander, destacados en Escipión 84-249, han muerto heroicamente al intentar salvar a la población de este desastre. Sus últimos informes mencionan algunas vulnerabilidades en los sectores industriales de la colmena inferior, pero no entran en más detalles. Además, todos sus servidores están actualmente ocupados investigando las causas de la crisis, pero no hacen nada para hacer frente a sus consecuencias».
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but do not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences".

traits.locale_text: «Todavía no está claro. Las casas nobles se echan la culpa unas a otras. Agentes del venerable Achilleas Scalander, destacados en Escipión 84-249, han muerto heroicamente al intentar salvar a la población de este desastre. Sus últimos informes mencionan algunas vulnerabilidades en los sectores industriales de la colmena inferior, pero no entran en más detalles. Además, todos sus servidores están actualmente ocupados investigando las causas de la crisis, pero no hacen nada para hacer frente a sus consecuencias».

languages.text: 「いまだによく分からない。貴族は互いに責任をなすりつけ合っている。この災害から民を救おうと、サイピオーネ84-249に駐屯する由緒正しきアキレアス・スカランダーの諜報員が勇ましい死を遂げた。最新の報告書では、ハイヴ下部の産業セクターでの脆弱性についていくつか触れてあるが、それ以上の詳細は書かれていない。そのうえ、あなたの従者たちは皆、今回の危機の原因調査には取り組んでいるようだが、その結果については何ら対処していない」
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but do not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences".

traits.locale_text: 「いまだによく分からない。貴族は互いに責任をなすりつけ合っている。この災害から民を救おうと、サイピオーネ84-249に駐屯する由緒正しきアキレアス・スカランダーの諜報員が勇ましい死を遂げた。最新の報告書では、ハイヴ下部の産業セクターでの脆弱性についていくつか触れてあるが、それ以上の詳細は書かれていない。そのうえ、あなたの従者たちは皆、今回の危機の原因調査には取り組んでいるようだが、その結果については何ら対処していない」

languages.text: « Nul ne le sait exactement. Les maisons nobles se rejettent la faute et les agents du vénérable Achilleas Scalander, postés sur Scipione 84-249, sont morts héroïquement en tentant de sauver la population du désastre. Leurs derniers rapports mentionnent certaines faiblesses dans les secteurs industriels de la ruche inférieure, mais sans donner plus de détails. De plus, tous vos serviteurs sont actuellement occupés à enquêter sur les causes du problème sans rien faire pour en gérer les conséquences ».
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another. Agents of the venerable Achilleas Scalander, stationed on Scipione 84-249, have died heroically while trying to save the population from this disaster. Their latest reports mention some vulnerabilities in the industrial sectors of the lower hive but do not go into further detail. Additionally, all of your servants are currently busy with investigating the causes of the crisis but are not doing anything to deal with its consequences."

traits.locale_text: « Nul ne le sait exactement. Les maisons nobles se rejettent la faute et les agents du vénérable Achilleas Scalander, postés sur Scipione 84-249, sont morts héroïquement en tentant de sauver la population du désastre. Leurs derniers rapports mentionnent certaines faiblesses dans les secteurs industriels de la ruche inférieure, mais sans donner plus de détails. De plus, tous vos serviteurs sont actuellement occupés à enquêter sur les causes du problème sans rien faire pour en gérer les conséquences ».

languages.text: "Es ist noch unklar. Die Adelshäuser geben sich gegenseitig die Schuld. Agenten des ehrenwerten Achilleas Scalander, die auf Scipione 84-249 stationiert waren, sind bei dem heldenhaften Versuch gestorben, die Bevölkerung vor einer Katastrophe zu bewahren. Ihre jüngsten Berichte sprechen von Anfälligkeiten in den industriellen Sektoren der unteren Makropole, gehen aber nicht ins Detail. Darüber hinaus sind alle Eure Diener damit beschäftigt, die Ursachen für die Krise zu erforschen ... aber niemand tut etwas, um mit deren Folgen fertigzuwerden."
languages.original_text: "It is still unclear. The noble houses are throwing the blame at one another.
